column5: Hey everyone, these are just some pics from the last couple of weeks.  I actually caught that carp on a spoon! I love fishing Lake Ontario!  Enjoy!
Tell me about it.. when throwing lures around Toronto you get some wierd and whacky hits.. Earlier this year a bullhead hit a blue williams spoon I was throwing, lol..

Nice catch !!!! More of lake ontarios fish ,that came out to play..  ..i have only ever done that once caught a carp,with a little cleo,casting into the warm water outflow years ago at the pickering nuke plant,and the whole mediumtreble was right inside his mouth !!!!!! he must have sucked it up while it was drifting in the current across the bottom....different thats for sure...cheers
nice fish.. i know exactly where you fished! i've seen some carp there, but never caught any But i'm caught some panfish and some bass out of there, apparently alot of pike too. good stuff!  kevin
